original_text: No, you would not say that. You would say to your servant, “Prepare my meal for me. Dress yourself properly and bring the food to me. I will eat and drink first. You can eat when I have finished.”
korean_text: 도리어 그더러 내 먹을 것을 준비하고 띠를 띠고 내가 먹고 마시는 동안에 수종들고 너는 그 후에 먹고 마시라 하지 않겠느냐

sentences.original_text: No, you would not say that.
sentences.korean_translation: 아니요, 당신은 그렇게 말하지 않을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: You would say to your servant,
and bring the food to me.
I will eat and drink first.
You can eat when I have finished.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 다 마친 후에 너는 먹을 수 있다.
